title: Roku Channel Builder Launches From Right Brain Media
text:
Orlando, FL (PRBuzz) October 9, 2015 – Today Right Brain Media announced the launch of Roku Channel Builder -- the easy-to-use, web-based platform for building and publishing a streaming media channel to the Roku Channel Store. With no programming skills required, Roku Channel Builder allows users to style their channel’s look, upload media and publish their channel in a few easy steps.
The new platform, available to users immediately at RokuChannelBuilder.com , has several key features that make it particularly attractive to small and moderately-sized content providers.
Highlights of Roku Channel Builder:
 • Fully customizable styling options – The platform makes it a breeze to integrate brand graphics, logos and custom color schemes to make a user’s channel stand out and attract maximum viewers.
 • No programming required – Users can upload content and style their channel without any coding. Right Brain Media handles the coding, packaging, testing and publishing to the Roku Channel Store.
 • Seamless integration with your content provider – Roku Channel Builder’s feed-based structure syncs content from any supported content provider. While users may host content with Right Brain Media’s own RBMtv.com, new support is constantly being added for other providers.
 • Channel updates are pushed live in real time – Because Roku Channel Builder is feed-based, any content changes or updates are pushed live immediately and reach viewers directly.
 • Unlimited space for media uploads – There is no limit on the amount of content a user may upload to a channel.
 • Dedicated, friendly support team – Right Brain Media’s support team is always ready to answer customers’ channel building questions.
Roku Channel Builder is for content creators looking to expand their presence and grow their audience in any category including sports, comedy, music, faith-based, product reviews, lifestyle, cooking and travel.
Content creators interested in building their own Roku channel can get started over at RokuChannelBuilder.com.
To learn more about Right Brain Media, visit RightBrainMedia.com .
About RiGHT BRAiN MEDiA:
Right Brain Media, Inc. (RBM.tv), founded in 2002, is a pioneer in digital media and web technology serving Fortune 500 companies, businesses and non-profit organizations. Right Brain Media specializes in digital media centers, interactive e-books, websites, Internet TV channels, live streaming, mobile apps and Software-as-a-Service (SaaS).
